name: Pixel Block Cube Craft Builder
description:
Pixel block cube craft builder is a game, where you build your world planet from cubes. You are equiped with mini pickaxe that can destroy or create blocks. The land is autosaving, so you should not worry that you lose your built city, town, house, mine, tree, castle or maze. Game contains fly mode, that can help you to build your stuff. Make screenshots and send them to other people or friends. Enjoy this super free game. Start terra forming your land space on island. Explore whole world. This game is about building, constructing and exploration ( discovery ).

- 3D cube building game
- autosaving
- fly mode
